7// system_utils_posix.cpp: Implementation of POSIX OS-specific functions.
8
9#include "system_utils.h"
10
11#include <array>
12#include <iostream>
13
14#include <dlfcn.h>
15#include <sys/stat.h>
16#include <sys/types.h>
17#include <sys/wait.h>
18#include <unistd.h>
19
20namespace angle
21{
22Optional<std::string> GetCWD()
23{
24 std::array<char, 4096> pathBuf;
25 char *result = getcwd(pathBuf.data(), pathBuf.size());
26 if (result == nullptr)
27 {
28 return Optional<std::string>::Invalid();
29 }
30 return std::string(pathBuf.data());
31}
32
33bool SetCWD(const char *dirName)
34{
35 return (chdir(dirName) == 0);
36}
37
38bool UnsetEnvironmentVar(const char *variableName)
39{
40 return (unsetenv(variableName) == 0);
41}
42
43bool SetEnvironmentVar(const char *variableName, const char *value)
44{
45 return (setenv(variableName, value, 1) == 0);
46}
47
48std::string GetEnvironmentVar(const char *variableName)
49{
50 const char *value = getenv(variableName);
51 return (value == nullptr ? std::string() : std::string(value));
52}
53
54const char *GetPathSeparatorForEnvironmentVar()
55{
56 return ":";
57}
58
59std::string GetHelperExecutableDir()
60{
61 std::string directory;
62 static int placeholderSymbol = 0;
63 Dl_info dlInfo;
64 if (dladdr(&placeholderSymbol, &dlInfo) != 0)
65 {
66 std::string moduleName = dlInfo.dli_fname;
67 directory = moduleName.substr(0, moduleName.find_last_of('/') + 1);
68 }
69 return directory;
70}
71
72class PosixLibrary : public Library
73{
74 public:
75 PosixLibrary(const std::string &fullPath) : mModule(dlopen(fullPath.c_str(), RTLD_NOW)) {}
76
77 ~PosixLibrary() override
78 {
79 if (mModule)
80 {
81 dlclose(mModule);
82 }
83 }
84
85 void *getSymbol(const char *symbolName) override
86 {
87 if (!mModule)
88 {
89 return nullptr;
90 }
91
92 return dlsym(mModule, symbolName);
93 }
94
95 void *getNative() const override { return mModule; }
96
97 private:
98 void *mModule = nullptr;
99};
100
101Library *OpenSharedLibrary(const char *libraryName, SearchType searchType)
102{
103 std::string directory;
104 if (searchType == SearchType::ApplicationDir)
105 {
106 directory = GetHelperExecutableDir();
107 }
108
109 std::string fullPath = directory + libraryName + "." + GetSharedLibraryExtension();
110 return new PosixLibrary(fullPath);
111}
112
113Library *OpenSharedLibraryWithExtension(const char *libraryName)
114{
115 return new PosixLibrary(libraryName);
116}
117
118bool IsDirectory(const char *filename)
119{
120 struct stat st;
121 int result = stat(filename, &st);
122 return result == 0 && ((st.st_mode & S_IFDIR) == S_IFDIR);
123}
124
125bool IsDebuggerAttached()
126{
127 // This could have a fuller implementation.
128 // See https://cs.chromium.org/chromium/src/base/debug/debugger_posix.cc
129 return false;
130}
131
132void BreakDebugger()
133{
134 // This could have a fuller implementation.
135 // See https://cs.chromium.org/chromium/src/base/debug/debugger_posix.cc
136 abort();
137}
138
139const char *GetExecutableExtension()
140{
141 return "";
142}
143
144char GetPathSeparator()
145{
146 return '/';
147}
148} // namespace angle
